channel.title: Software tools on CoLoMoTo
channel.description: Recent content in Software tools on CoLoMoTo

item.title: bioLQM: Logical Qualitative Modelling toolkit
item.description: Java library for the manipulation and conversion of logical models

item.title: BoolNet
item.description: R package for the simulation, reconstruction and analysis of various types of Boolean networks

item.title: CellNetAnalyzer
item.description: A MATLAB package with graphical user interface for structural and functional analysis of cellular networks

item.title: CellNOpt (CellNetOptimizer)
item.description: CellNOpt is a free open-source toolbox for creating logic-based models of signal transduction networks, and training them against high-throughput biochemical data.

item.title: EpiLog
item.description: Simulation of epithelial patterning using multi-cellular multivalued logical models

item.title: Genetic Network Analyzer (GNA)
item.description: Genetic Network Analyzer (GNA) is a computer tool for the qualitative modeling, analysis, and simulation of gene regulatory networks

item.title: GINsim
item.description: Java software for the construction and analysis of multivalued models

item.title: JSBML
item.description: Java API library for parsing and writing SBML files and for in-memory manipulation of SBML data structures

item.title: LogicModelClassifier
item.description: A comprehensive number of Python scripts that allow the specification, management and analysis of model pools

item.title: Pint
item.description: Static analyzer for transient dynamics of automata networks

item.title: PyBoolNet
item.description: Python API for the analysis of Boolean networks

item.title: SQUAD & BoolSim
item.description: Standardized continous simulation of logical models

item.title: TemporalLogicTimeSeries
item.description: Translates discretized time series data into LTL and CTL specifications for NuSMV model checking

item.title: The Cell Collective
item.description: Web-based plateform for the construction and simulation of Boolean models
